turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how may I help u?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I run an order of coffee in Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drink did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Cappuccino coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want order a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a milk preference for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't have any preference.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So What milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat it for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So what milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all of this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a tall Cappuccino with soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the total will be $4.50?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks, it should be ready for pick up in 6 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.
